topic.title: my first blog/website

topic.title: OpenSource Firebase replacement?
topic.body: I remember watching the video on http://www.decentralizedweb.net/ and one of the projects is a Firebase replacement. Anyone knows of such project?

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: is my identity really mine? how do i make sure i keep it?

> [nofish](#comment_685_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): backup data/users.json file, it contains your private keys.

Thanks!

1_17gEFavobc7RsKNGbSzZwoSZ6jNB7hT2KN.body:
> [zerolife](#comment_9_1DyHtc8AMKrqjEja7Bi8rQ1hfcc3fTwsSw): Getting "content.json download failed". Maybe sign and publish your site again

it should be up now. thanks a lot.
